column4: does it also work on jeos (not meant as a live cd, most remaster tools seem to be based on modifying a squasfs fs) ?
it likely will do as jeos is ubuntu correct
uck-gui doesn't like jeos: File /mnt/hgfs/ISO/jeos-8.04-jeos-i386.iso is not an Ubuntu DESKTOP EDITION ISO image, alternate CDs can be remastered using backend scripts.
